thread.title: Can You Pass the NFL Bench Press Test?
thread.title_full: Can You Pass the NFL Bench Press Test?

author: jnosek1
title: Can You Pass the NFL Bench Press Test?
text:
Privacy Policy | About Us 
Sacrament is just one of the fitness tests spread throughout the 100+ workouts featured in my new Men’s Health book, Maximus Body , which also includes my three- and six-month training plans for building a ripped physique and elite fitness. 
It’s pretty simple: Load a barbell with 225 pounds and fire off as many reps as you can. Fifteen reps or more is the standard in the Church of Bobby Maximus. My record is 36 reps. 
Can’t bench 225? No problem. Use a bar that weighs equal to your bodyweight. If you weigh 150 pounds, for example, use a bar that weighs 150 (or lighter, if need be). Make sure the bar touches your chest at the bottom, and your arms lock out at the top. 
Bobby Maximus is the training director of Gym Jones, one of the country’s most elite and hardcore gyms.
